message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $19,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, however, I can't sell it for less than $16,000. This product is in high demand, and I'm confident it would bring you a lot of value.

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your position, but I am still unable to meet the price of $16,000. I am willing to offer $14,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
